response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I propose a special introductory price of $140 for you. This is an excellent opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a discounted rate compared to its usual value of $150. I trust it will meet your expectations and contribute positively to your needs. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 140}
